name: HTML5 Game Portal (with Social Features)
description:
Made with Cocos Creator, an cross-platform game engine.

Using GameSparks cloud service for backend

Embed Web (mobile or desktop) Games

Can embed all kinds of HTML5 web games into this game portal system.

If the game only have keyboard control and doesn't come with touch control system with the game, can integrate this game into our game gallery by using the general touch-screen control system as shown below:

Social features: 
  • Friend list to send in-game gifts to friends or ask friends for hearts (when dies too many times and have no more in-game hearts to play the game)
  • Inbox system to receive daily rewards and friends' gift or heart requests.
  • Leaderboard to show the top players globally or among friends. Let gamer friends to compete with each other.
  • Get referral rewards (skin or in-game currency) when invite friends and friends join the game.
